author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of a special drive, the Regional Transport Office, Thiruvanmiyur, has seized around 250 autos for various irregularities.

A senior official of the Transport Department said a special inspection was organised based on complaints from commuters about overcharging and other violations.

The team headed by Motor Vehicles Inspectors seized 250 autos for various defects of overloading, seat alteration and meter defects.

Of these, permits of 199 autos were suspended and the remaining 51 autos were fined according to the Motor Vehicles Act.

The auto drivers whose permits were suspended have been warned.
title: 250 autos seized in Thiruvanmiyur
